title: Old Testament
description: Journey through the Old Testament with structured daily readings and historical context

lessons.title: Genesis: The Beginning
lessons.content: We begin our Old Testament journey with the creation account, establishing God's sovereignty and purpose in creation.
reflectionQuestions: What does Genesis 1 reveal about God's character?
How does the creation account form the foundation for the rest of Scripture?
What does it mean to be created in God's image?
lessons.practicalApplication: Reflect on your role as a steward of God's creation and how you can fulfill this responsibility today.
